EXPERIENCE.title: Full Stack Developer
EXPERIENCE.description: Working as a Full Stack Developer in a startup environment, contributing to the development of a CRM platform based on a microservices architecture. I collaborate across frontend and backend tasks, quickly adapting to new features and system requirements while focusing on scalability, reliability, and clean system design.
responsibilities: Frontend and backend feature development
Collaboration in a microservices-based architecture
Participation in technical discussions and sprint planning
Rapid adaptation to changing requirements
Focus on system stability and scalability

EXPERIENCE.title: Full Stack Developer (Freelance)
EXPERIENCE.company: iLockersApp - SaaS Platform for Laundries | Remote (Mexico)
EXPERIENCE.description: End-to-end development of a multi-tenant SaaS platform for laundry businesses. This paid freelance project involved direct communication with the client, full ownership of architecture decisions, and delivery of a production-ready system in a short timeframe.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented scalable full stack architecture
Developed multi-tenant system with role-based access (customer, owner, admin)
Integrated Stripe payments and subscription plans
Implemented real-time order updates using Socket.IO
Generated PDF invoices and automated WhatsApp notifications
Built customizable websites per business with dynamic routing
Handled deployment, domain setup, and post-launch support

EXPERIENCE.title: Freelance Web Developer
EXPERIENCE.description: Freelance web development services for local and international clients, delivering production-ready websites and web systems with a strong focus on UI quality, backend reliability, and long-term client support.
responsibilities: Development of landing pages, corporate websites, and web systems
Custom UI development using Tailwind CSS and pure CSS
Backend development with REST APIs and MongoDB
Deployment on Vercel with custom domain configuration
Ongoing maintenance, improvements, and client support
Clear communication with clients through explanations, visuals, and video demos

EXPERIENCE.title: Full Stack Career
EXPERIENCE.description: Completed an intensive Full Stack development program covering frontend and backend technologies. Strengthened skills through practical projects and continued expanding knowledge independently in production-level systems and real-world applications.
responsibilities: Frontend development with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and React
Backend development with Node.js, Express, and databases
Development of e-commerce and web application projects
Self-learning in TypeScript, NestJS, DevOps, and game development

Presentacion.subtitle: Programmer Full Stack
Presentacion.description: Full Stack developer specialized in SaaS ecosystems and e-commerce. My main focus is designing maintainable systems under solid architecture patterns, ensuring that code grows at the pace of business.

Sobremi.subsobre: From lines of code to scalable business solutions

descripcion.1: I'm Edu, a developer with experience in startups and international clients. I specialize in bringing SaaS platforms and CRMs to life that are in constant production, where code quality and structure are non-negotiable.
descripcion.2: Currently, I contribute to the development of a CRM in a Chilean startup, working in a microservices environment. My role focuses on balancing the delivery of new features with the stability of a clean and decoupled architecture.
descripcion.3: I integrate easily into agile teams, contributing not only code, but a technical vision focused on separation of responsibilities and clear communication. My goal is to build robust software that survives the test of time and market demands.

projects.name: Polo Ecommerce - Complete System
projects.description: Complete ecommerce platform for polo sales with administration system, real-time notifications, Tupay payment gateway, order management and customizable landing page. Includes multiple authentication (Google, normal users and administrators), shopping cart, Facebook-style notification system and complete administrative panel.
projects.alt: Complete ecommerce system for polo sales

projects.name: ArmalyTech Website
projects.description: A website dedicated to cell phone repair and other technical services, offering direct contact with the technician.

projects.name: Formatos Integraficos
projects.description: Landing page developed for a SUNAT-authorized printing company in Peru, focused on attracting clients who require printing of fiscal formats such as invoices, proformas, and POS vouchers. The system implements a modular component architecture with Astro, integrating a quote form that automatically redirects to WhatsApp with preloaded data. Includes SEO optimizations with meta tags for Open Graph and Twitter Cards, automatic sitemap generation, and a responsive structure with Tailwind CSS. Technically relevant for its performance approach through static generation and direct integration with business communication channels.

projects.name: Free QR Generator
projects.description: Free and accessible web platform for generating personalized QR codes. Allows creating QR codes for URLs, WhatsApp, WiFi, and plain text, with customization options for size, color, and logo. Includes export in multiple formats (PNG, JPG, PDF, SVG), multi-language support (ES, EN, PT), dark/light mode and responsive design. Developed with React + TypeScript and Node.js + Express, optimized to be fast and easy to use for anyone at no cost.

projects.name: Lords of Memes and Magic
projects.description: Project developed for the bonsai.meme community. 2D Unity game that combined construction, exploration and battle mechanics with integration to its own cryptocurrency. Although the project remained a prototype due to lack of budget and closure of the crypto initiative, it allowed implementing tilemap systems, resource management, animations and UI in Unity.

Footer.description: Full Stack developer passionate about creating innovative digital experiences and quality technological solutions.
